title: Clasic Analog Face For Moto360
summary: provides a perfect choice for lovers of classical Watches
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Typical Class background with well-designed needles, highlight the model’s Artistic design Style.with built-in features like Ambient mode, sms notifications, email notifications, date and battery status. Customize your watch face with changing background and foreground color. Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:-• Classic Design• Ultimate readability • Clean and simplistic look • Military / police / Aviator Watch Face • Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than everThis watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Typical Class background with well-designed needles, highlight the model’s Artistic design Style.with built-in features like Ambient mode, sms notifications, email notifications, date and battery status. Customize your watch face with changing background and foreground color.
Frillroid focus is in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and required keen concentration to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.
Key custom features:-
• Classic Design
• Ultimate readability
• Clean and simplistic look
• Military / police / Aviator Watch Face
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge
• Ambient mode engineered with the latest wear Api makes your watch’s battery stronger than ever

This watch face is for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frilldroid.com.
How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Select notification preferences to see the unread messages or emails. Also select the weather background as wallpaper or solid colors.
Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
